description: <text color="gray">real ones know why it's exactly that color (no it's not GT)</text>

<text>Welcome to <color color="#555555">F</color><color color="#55504b">l</color><color color="#554c41">a</color><color color="#554737">t</color><color color="#54422e">T</color><color color="#543d24">e</color><color color="#54391a">c</color><color color="#543410">h</color>, a <aqua>GregTech</aqua> modpack on a superflat world!</text>
Not sure what else to put here, so here's a legend on what some of the colored things mean in quest descriptions:
• [key.jump]: Dark gray brackets are keybinds. Try changing your jump key, and this will update!
• []: Gray brackets are items, hover to see the tooltip you'd see in your inventory.
